Class MainMenuControlsHelper

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.mainMenu.MainMenuControlsHelper
public class MainMenuControlsHelper extends Object
Helper to show the multiplayer controls overlay and collect the chosen key bindings. This is extracted from MainMenuController to reduce its size and surface area.

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show(ClassLoader loaderClassLoader, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpLeft_left, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpLeft_right, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpLeft_rotate, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpLeft_down, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpLeft_hard, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpLeft_switch, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpRight_left, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpRight_right, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpRight_rotate, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpRight_down, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpRight_hard, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode mpRight_switch, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane rootStack, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane controlsOptions, Consumer<MainMenuControlsHelper.Result> onSave, BiConsumer<javafx.scene.layout.StackPane,Runnable> closeOverlayCaller, Consumer<javafx.scene.layout.StackPane> transitionCaller)
      Show the multiplayer controls overlay.
      Parameters:
      loaderClassLoader - class loader used to load FXML/resources
      mpLeft_left - current left-player left key (may be null)
      mpLeft_right - current left-player right key
      mpLeft_rotate - current left-player rotate key
      mpLeft_down - current left-player down key
      mpLeft_hard - current left-player hard-drop key
      mpLeft_switch - current left-player switch key
      mpRight_left - current right-player left key
      mpRight_right - current right-player right key
      mpRight_rotate - current right-player rotate key
      mpRight_down - current right-player down key
      mpRight_hard - current right-player hard-drop key
      mpRight_switch - current right-player switch key
      rootStack - the root stack where overlay will be added
      controlsOptions - the controls options pane (to hide/restore)
      onSave - callback invoked with the selected key bindings when Save is pressed
      closeOverlayCaller - caller to run close animation: (overlay, onFinished)
      transitionCaller - caller to run transitionTo(overlay)

    • showSinglePlayerControls

      public void showSinglePlayerControls(ClassLoader loaderClassLoader, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode spLeft, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode spRight, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode spRotate, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode spDown, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode spHard, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode spSwitch, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane rootStack, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane controlsOptions, Consumer<MainMenuControlsHelper.Result> onSave, BiConsumer<javafx.scene.layout.StackPane,Runnable> closeOverlayCaller, Consumer<javafx.scene.layout.StackPane> transitionCaller)
      Show the single-player controls overlay and return the chosen keys via onSave. Parameters mirror the original method moved from MainMenuController but use caller-provided animation/close handlers for consistency with multiplayer.
